title: Pet App
desc: Project in collaboration with other Developers. Pet App is for individual pet owners as well as for animal shelters, trainers or pet hotels to store data about each pet to help with vet appointents, medication and other pet informations.

title: Japan Journeys
desc: Travel guide about Japan with places selected from my presonal favourites. Each place has also a comments section for review, and if logged in as Admin, also possible to add, edit and remove posts.

title: Japanese Site
desc: Project focuses on recreating some of design elements from sarigato.com website, as a learning opportunity for using Anime.js and CSS animations.

title: Healthy Skin e-commerce site
desc: This is a e-commerce store for cosmetics company made with only front-end features. Shopping cart logic is written with support of Coding Addict (John Smilga) tutorial whose video was uploaded on freeCodeCamp.org channel. I have added maximum item amount in cart ( max to 25 items per product) together with alert message when limit is reached.

title: Tip-Calculator App - challenge from Frontend Mentor
desc: Small App created as close as possible to the provided design from jpg files. Challenge by Frontend Mentor, a platform with challenges to improve coding skills.This project focuses on VUE & SCSS.

title: Some Tea
desc: Basic restaurant menu project in Vue with filtering buttons.

title: Comments section
desc: Comment section application built with React and TypeScript. The app features a reusable modal component and allows users to add, edit, delete, and view comments.
